name: Gaia's Embrace
description:
A 2D Platformer by Patrick Larmon, Cameron Foister, Wilson Russell, Karin, and Samantha & Isabella Jones, Developed for the Global Game Jam 2019 under the theme of Repair.

Gaia's Embrace is a creative 2D platformer centered around a world where humanity has retreated into the earths core to escape a horrific surface world of their own creation. You play as a person with the ability to destroy and rebuild the environment around them to escape the oppressive society of the underworld and return to the surface.
